original_text: To whom I answered, It is not the manner of the Romans to deliver any man to die, before that he which is accused have the accusers face to face, and have licence to answer for himself concerning the crime laid against him.
korean_text: 내가 대답하되 무릇 피고가 원고들 앞에서 고소 사건에 대하여 변명할 기회가 있기 전에 내주는 것은 로마 사람의 법이 아니라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: It is not the manner of the Romans
to deliver any man to die
before that he which is accused

sentences.korean_translation: 얼굴을 맞대고 고발하는 자들을 만나기 전까지는

sentences.original_text: and have licence to answer for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신을 위해 답변할 허락을 받기 전까지는
